name: Trump Crisis Simulator 2020 - LYSOL EDITION
description:
THIS IS THE POST-JAM VERSION OF MY LUDUM DARE 46 ENTRY!
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/trump-crisis-simulator-2020

Press M to mute/unmute!

There's a lethal pandemic, threatening the most important thing in the USA:  

Your POLLS and TV RATINGS!  

If either hit zero, you're fired! Can you keep them alive for 30 days?  

And, like, the american people or whatever

"The best game ever" - Some people  
"So much better than Obama's handling of Ebola" - Many people 

Third party assets:  
Trump - Denys Almaral https://denysalmaral.com/2018/11/free-donald-trump-high-quality-3d-caricature.ht...

Bust base - chauvanla https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/printable-alexander-bust-obj/738486  
Coke can - MegaKosan https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/1040799  
Lectern - hlostoops https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-models/exterior/other/presidential-inauguration...
